---
page_title: "arubacloud_elasticip"
subcategory: "Network"
description: |-
  Retrieves an ArubaCloud ElasticIP.
---

# arubacloud_elasticip

Reads an existing ArubaCloud Elastic IP.

```terraform
data "arubacloud_elastic_ip" "example" {
  name       = "example-elastic-ip"
  project_id = "example-project"
  location   = "eu-1"
}
```


## Schema

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema


### Arguments

The following arguments are supported:

#### Required

- `id` (String) Elastic IP identifier

### Attributes Reference

In addition to all arguments above, the following attributes are exported:

#### Read-Only

- `ip` (String) Elastic IP address
